section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains a log of actions that have been taken on this outside film record.

stentry.p: Indicates the type of action that was taken on this exam record during processing of this exam.. Possible values are EXAM ENTRY; EDIT BY CASE NO.; EDIT BY PATIENT; DIAGNOSIS ENTRY BY CASE NO.; EXAM STATUS TRACKING; CANCELLED; COMPLETE STATUS OVERRIDE; UPDATE STATUS; NO PURGING SPECIFIED; etc.
The comments of the Technologist as the exam is edited - Information, pertinent to the editing of the exam.
The date/time that the action was taken.
